---
title: "Population genomics"
---

These are the exercises for a course on how to do basic population genomic analyses: 

[Part 0](content/0_introduction_to_linux.qmd): here you can brush up on your linux command line knowledge, or get started learning about the command line. A basic understanding and proficiency is required for the rest of this exercise. 

[Part 1](content/1_qc_and_read_mapping.qmd): here you can learn about quality control of your samples, read mapping and variant calling. 

[Part 2](content/2_vcf_manipulation.qmd): here you will learn more about the data, the metadata and basic vcf manipulations.
